commands.description: Check the disabled commands and enable/disable commands.
commands.usage:
- `PREFIXcommands` to display all currently disabled commands
- `PREFIXcommands [disable/enable] [command]` to disable/enable commands.

cooldowns.description: Check the all the custom cooldowns of a command and add new cooldowns.
cooldowns.usage:
- `PREFIXcooldowns [command]` to display all modified cooldowns for a command and update them.
- `PREFIXcooldowns [command] set [role] [cooldown]` to set the cooldown for this command to a certain value.- `PREFIXcooldowns [command] clear [role]` to use the default cooldown for this command.

help.usage:
To get help on a specific command, use `PREFIXhelp [command name]` (without the [ ]).
For a full list of all commands, simply use `PREFIXhelp`.

names.isDisabled: This command is currently disabled in this server.
names.categoriesHelp: Use `PREFIXhelp [category]` to get more info on a category, for example: `PREFIXhelp misc`

permissions.description: Set your own custom permissions that your users need to run this command in your server.
permissions.usage: - `PREFIXpermissions [command]` to display and change the permissions someone needs to use this command.

setprefix.description: Set a new prefix for your server.

setlanguage.description: Set the language you want to get help on commands with.
setlanguage.usage:
- `PREFIXsetlanguage [new language]` to set a new language
- `PREFIXsetlanguage` to get a list of available languages.

alias.description: Set your own custom aliases for any command.
alias.usage:
- `PREFIXalias` to view all aliases
- `PREFIXalias set [new alias] [command name]` to add a new alias for a specific command
- `PREFIXalias remove [alias]` to remove an existing alias

setcolor.usage:
- `PREFIXssetcolor` to view your color and all available colors
- `PREFIXsetcolor [new color]` to set your color

channels.description: Check all the channels that will the bot will ignore and disable/enable them.
channels.usage:
- `PREFIXchannels` to display all currently disabled channels
- `PREFIXchannels [disable/enable] [channel]` to disable/enable channels.
